warehouseID.description: Property. The unique identifier for the warehouse.

itemNumber.description: Property. The unique identifier for the item.

name.description: Property. The name of the item.

physicalStock.description: Property. The physical stock of the item.

physicalAvailability.description: Property. The physical availability of the item.

physicalBooked.description: Property. The physical booked quantity of the item.

availableTotal.description: Property. The total available quantity of the item.

researchName.description: Property. The research name of the item.

site.description: Property. The site where the item is located.

location.description: Property. The location of the item.

totalOrdered.description: Property. The total quantity ordered for the item.

onDelivery.description: Property. The quantity of the item on delivery.

orderedBooked.description: Property. The quantity of the item ordered and booked.

netWeight.description: Property. The net weight of the item.
